name: The Good Lives
description:
The Good Lives is a game created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. In the game you will be playing as an animal which has to do deeds around the map to change the animals karma points. When you get enough karma points you will then be reincarnated as a new animal.


Controls: Keyboard and Mouse   Controller                      Movement    W,A,S,D         Left Stick               LookMouseRight StickSprint      Left Shift Right ShoulderJumpSpace A (South Button)AttackLeft Mouse ClickRight TriggerInteractEX  (West Button)HealQY (North Button)Pause Menu Escape Key Start Button Third-party assets:

Art:

Quirky series - Animals pack 1

Quirky series - Animals pack 2

Toon fantasy nature

Sound:

Total music Collection
